validations.message: Only heading 2, heading 3, heading 4, link to Url, link to entry, link to asset, unordered list, and ordered list nodes are allowed

entity.name: Advice collection - public
entity.description:
A self-contained piece of advice that answers a definitive user need from start to end. 

Appears on the website as a page.

validations.message: Only headings 2 to 4, ordered lists, unordered lists, assets, links and embedded entries are allowed
Please make this less than 250 characters, so it's easy to skim on a search results page
